# count.NA

<!-- badges: start -->
<!--badges: end --> 

The goal of count.NA is to count the missing values (NA) in a specified column

## Installation

You can install the development version of count.NA from [GitHub] (https://github.com/) with: 

```{r}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("stat545ubc-2022/assignment-b1-and-b2-graceeluo")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to 

```{r example}
library(datateachr)
count.NA(cancer_sample, "diagnosis")
```
